item.description:
Join members and guests of both the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group (SSDOMG) and the South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club Meetup Group (SSHBSC) as we take a trip 'over the bridge' to Sandwich for a Saturday afternoon lunch "down the Cape!"

Dan'l Webster Inn topped a recent SSDOMG poll asking members to choose among a group of member-suggested restaurants that we hadn't yet dined at. And, as it happens, Mike and Angela have been interested in bringing our members here for a long time. Combine the interest of our membership and our Org Team with a conversation between Mike and Roger (Group Organizer of SSHBSC) at Cafe Bella and, faster than you can say "Jabez Stone", the winds of circumstance combined into a "perfect storm", bringing our two groups together and blowing them right across the Canal and into historic Sandwich Village!

 

This just in!  We have a coupon for 20% off the food portion of our meals good for the entire party!

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Saturday Afternoon Lunch "Down the Cape"

Dan'l Webster Inn 
Saturday, May 5th, 2012 @ 12:30 PM 
149 Main Street
Historic Sandwich Village, MA
(508) 888-3622
Website: Dan'l Webster Inn

Meeting Location: Please meet outside the front door (or by the host station if the weather is not great).  If you arrive after we are seated please ask for "Michael" or the "South Shore Meetup Group."

Carpool Location: Braintree Carpool departs at 11:15am.  The drive is approximately one hour and we are allowing a few extra minutes for unexpected traffic.

Organizers: Angela & Mike

Guests: Yes. Two per member allowed. For questions about exceptions, please contact Mike.

Min/Max: Minimum of six from both groups by Thursday, May 3rd.  There is currently no maximum.

Price Range: The cheapest lunch shown online will cost you $9.50 (Buffalo Chicken Roll-Up), with most burgers and sandwiches coming in between $10.00 - $11.50 (a couple that have lobster as a primary ingredient will set you back significantly more). Pizzas range from $9.50 - $12.00, lunch entrees from $13.00 - $17.00. Prices from the online lunch menu.

Event Fee: None.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over five years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

RSVP Deadline: Friday, May 4th @ 7:00 pm. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by the Event Organizer. Changes to "No" after the deadline will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us Pages.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions (Credit to Dan'l Webster Inn website):

From Route 495/25 South:
Follow Route 25 South over the Bourne Bridge onto Cape Cod. At the bridge rotary, take Route 6/6A toward Sagamore. At the traffic light, turn right onto Route 6 East. Follow Route 6 to exit 2 (Sandwich/Route 130). Bear left as you come down the exit ramp and merge with Route 130. Continue on Route 130 for about 1.5 miles. Bear right onto Main Street. The Dan'l Webster Inn is located approximately .25 mile on the left.

From Sagamore Bridge:
Cross the Sagamore Bridge to Route 6 East. Follow Route 6 East for approximately 5 minutes to Exit 2 (Sandwich/Route 130). Bear left as you come down the exit ramp and merge with Route 130. Continue on Route 130 for about 1.5 miles. Bear right onto Main Street. The Dan'l Webster Inn is located approximately .25 mile on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet outside the front door or by the Host station. Our reservation is under both 'Michael' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: The Diners and Dan'l Webster!
